commission_expert_groups_and_other_simil: Expert Group on the exchange of information on Best Available Techniques related to industrial emissions (IED Article 13 Forum)#E02611#http://ec.europa.eu/transparency/regexpert/index.cfm?do=groupDetail.groupDetail&groupID=2611#Member#C
goals__remit: The European Sealing Association aims to be the collective voice of the majority of the manufacturing organisations based in Europe involved in manufacturing sealing devices. It provides guidance on installation practices and operates under the guidelines of aiming to be Influential, provide data which has Relevance and is a Knowledge source of information on sealing products.
